title: Two ABQ Climbers Rescued From Rocky Mountain Avalanche
body: AP																		Two ABQ Climbers Rescued From Rocky Mountain Avalanche																																		Published by Associated Press					16 mins agoJune 2, 2022																			ROCKY MOUNTAIN NATIONAL PARK, Colo. (AP) — Authorities say rescuers have recovered the body of a man who was killed in a weekend rock fall and avalanche that also injured two other climbers at Rocky Mountain National Park. Park spokeswoman Kyle Patterson said in a statement that a helicopter crew lifted the man’s body from […]
